text: Loamhedge is a fantasy book written by Brian Jacques in 2003. It is the sixteenth book in the Redwall series. It was translated into French and Russian, and was a New York Times bestseller. ==Plot== Loamhedge is about a young hare named Martha who cannot move her legs, and must use a wheelchair. It is also about the travels of her brother Horty, along with friends Bragoon, Saro, Fenna, and Springald, who are trying to find a cure for Martha. Category:Redwall Category:2003 books
title: Loamhedge
